# Shield, Light
## Overview
You can bash with a shield instead of using it for defense.


-tx-
| **Martial Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Light Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Shield, light | special | 1d2 | 1d3 | x2 | — | special | B | — |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 148
